sources.title: Open Secret
sources.description: Title: Open Secret Summary: Newlyweds come to visit groom's friend, only to discover him missing; and their investigation uncovers evidence of a ring of anti-semites terrorizing the neighborhood. Directed by: John Reinhardt Actors: John Ireland, Jane Randolph, Sheldon Leonard Production Company: Harry Brandt Productions Release Date: 14 February 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Newlyweds come to visit groom's friend, only to discover him missing; and their investigation uncovers evidence of a ring of anti-semites terrorizing the neighborhood.

sources.title: Open Secret (1948) JOHN IRELAND
sources.description:
Stars: John Ireland, Jane Randolph, Sheldon Leonard
Director: John Reinhardt

In this socially aware Film Noir, when Newlyweds visit the groom's friend back in the old neighborhood, they discover him missing. Investigation leads them to a violent hate cult willing to murder any "outsiders" unfortunate enough to set foot on their turf.

metadata.Plot: Newlyweds come to visit groom's friend, only to discover him missing; and their investigation uncovers evidence of a ring of anti-semites terrorizing the neighborhood.
metadata.Writer: Henry Blankfort, John Bright, Ted Murkland
metadata.Actors: John Ireland, Jane Randolph, Sheldon Leonard
